title: mri_path2label
description: Converts a path file to a label or a label file to a path file.

input_file.title: Input File
input_file.description: Input file, either a path or label file.

output_file.title: Output File
output_file.description: Output file, either a path or label file.

single.title: Single Path Flag
single.description: Only convert a single path, and do not use sentinel values.

path_to_label.title: Path to Label Flag
path_to_label.description: Treat input as a path and output a label.

label_to_path.title: Label to Path Flag
label_to_path.description: Treat input as a label and output a path.

connect.title: Connect Flag
connect.description: Connect path; input and output must be paths; requires subject and hemi.

fill.title: Fill Flag
fill.description: Fill already closed, connected path; input must be a path, output must be a label; requires subject, hemi, and seedvtx.

confillx.title: Confillx Flag
confillx.description: Connect and fill path; input must be a path, output must be a label; requires surface_fname and seedvtx.

confill.title: Confill Flag
confill.description: Connect and fill path; input must be a path, output must be a label; requires subject, hemi, and seedvtx.
